title: CODESYS Development System Improper Enforcement of Message Integrity Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of CODESYS Development System. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the LearnMoreAction function. The issue results from a missing integrity check on notification data. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current user.
timeline:
2023-05-11 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2023-08-14 - Coordinated public release of advisory
